Text: thanks, this is awesome! I always want to know more about film and film studies.

as of today: 6 seeders, 253 (make that 254 in a minute :-) ) leechers.

now that is a statement in itself, isn't it?

thanks bunches, man!

@ Auge
Nice work, especially not zipping all into one file. A while back when I was visiting Vancouver city I met this guy who was making a film and he had a directory (sort of yellow pages) for all the people and company who offered services such as rent a camera tripod, if you want to make rain and lightning etc. Is such a book in this torrent and if it is which one or where can I obtain one. These books are sometimes for a particular city or country.
My sister and her students are going to be very happy! thank you again and again!
This is a massive treasure trove. Thanks, Auge.
